lines.speaker: Larry Beige
lines.text: Afternoon, Clerk.

lines.speaker: Clerk
lines.text: Officer Beige. Back so soon? To what do I owe the visit? I thought the research was concluded?

lines.speaker: Larry Beige
lines.text: Can’t I just come to buy stuff from the nearest Kiosk shop, why the prejudice.

lines.speaker: Clerk
lines.text: No, I am sorry if I sound annoyed I was just surprised. Most people just go to the big stores like HyperMart.

lines.speaker: Larry Beige
lines.text: Their mistake. I would like the usual Hotshots and Chicken Jerky. Or not, today I would like Sprongles.

lines.speaker: Clerk
lines.text: Could I have your ID card as usual, cannot make exceptions…

lines.speaker: Larry Beige
lines.text: Very well…of course

lines.speaker: Larry Beige
lines.text: Thank you, clerk. Always by the book. And now for your information the investigation is never truly done, always someone to catch down the line…

lines.speaker: Clerk
lines.text: So you were here for the research!

lines.speaker: Larry Beige
lines.text: You have to calm down, clerk. Without being guilty it wont be a problem anyway right?

lines.speaker: Clerk
lines.text: Of course…but it is just…

lines.speaker: Larry Beige
lines.text: Mhmm interesting. I heard there have been many irregularities and all point to your small Kiosk

lines.speaker: Larry Beige
lines.text: This is the wrong question to ask clerk. You are not worried who is the source of information, you are worried about the discovery of your compliance

lines.speaker: Clerk
lines.text: Come on man, dont twist things, It was just some innocent question.

lines.speaker: Larry Beige
lines.text: I know about your connection with the Shady figure named Shaun Bakers. Or at least that is one of the ways he is known as.

lines.speaker: Clerk
lines.text: Ho...What? I don't know him

lines.speaker: Larry Beige
lines.text: HA…the mask fell off very quickly, cashier. I wanted to assess for myself if the information was correct. But because of your actions there is no more doubt. Thank you for your valuable cooperation on the investigation. You made my job way easier.

lines.speaker: Clerk
lines.text: No…no wait there is misunderstanding

lines.speaker: Larry Beige
lines.text: I will stop you spilling more lies…you are arrested

lines.speaker: Clerk
lines.text: Fuck
